notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: P.N.J., C.C., and M.R. wrote the manuscript text. M.R. conducted the RNA-Seq analysis and prepared all figures. J.L., L.S., P.C. oversaw the project and assisted with writing of the manuscript. D.G. assisted with clinical statistical analysis and edited the manuscript. Y.Z. and K.L. performed the genetic analysis. All authors reviewed the manuscript.
